TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageBodyMemberAttribute extends System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute

summary.span: 指定将成员序列化为 SOAP 正文中的元素。

span.span: Specifies that a member is serialized as an element inside the SOAP body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定将数据成员序列化到 SOAP 正文，并控制某些序列化项目。Use the attribute to specify that a data member is serialized into the SOAP body and to control some serialization items. 属性用于指定默认字母顺序不适用时的正文部分顺序。The property is used to specify the order of body parts in cases where the default alphabetical order is not appropriate. 其他属性是从基类 继承而来。The other properties are inherited from the base class, . 有关在不修改默认 SOAP 信封本身的情况下控制 SOAP 正文内容序列化的详细信息，请参阅 [在服务协定中指定数据传输](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts)和 [使用数据协定](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts)。For more information about controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts), and [Using Data Contracts](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用消息协定](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts)。For more information, see [Using Message Contracts](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来控制请求消息和响应消息的 SOAP 信封结构，以及如何使用 （创建响应消息的 SOAP 标头）和 （指定请求消息和响应消息的正文）。The following code example shows the use of the to control the SOAP envelope structure for both the request message and the response message, and the use of both the (to create a SOAP header for the response message) and the (to specify the bodies of both the request and response message). 此代码示例包含发送时的每个消息的示例。The code example contains an example of each message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关完整的示例，请参见 。See for a complete example.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Order : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取和设置一个值，该值指示将成员序列化到 SOAP 正文中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the position in which the member is serialized into the SOAP body.

value.span: SOAP 正文中元素的位置。

span.span: The location of the element in the SOAP body.

exception.span: 传入属性 setter 的值为负整数。

span.span: The value passed to the property setter is a negative integer.
